content.raw:
I made a few tweaks:

* bdd0107 simplifies the `IGN_CXX_##_FEATURES` implementation, since we may as well leverage the availability of cmake's new `cxx_std_##` feature.
* 82d3919 just removes the `...` since users might take that to mean we support arbitrary standards, even though we only support 3 standards.

I haven't upgraded to Bionic yet, so it would be pretty messy for me to really test these changes, but I don't see anything conceptually wrong. Since it's going to an experimental branch, I'm fine with moving forward on merging this, and then fixing issues as they arise.
